assignments.description: Fill the VarT_FlowElement with 'Apex_SendBusinessToOkapi' if the Element fails.

Flow.description: Subflow used for sending the in Salesforce created or updated account to OKAPI. Two Betaalgegevens variables (Active & Default) and Account Address start & end date were added.
Flow.label: AL - Send Account to OKAPI

loops.description: Loop through the Bank Account collection variable
loops.name: Loop_Through_Betaalgegevens
loops.label: Loop Through Betaalgegevens

recordLookups.label: Account Address - Billing

recordLookups.name: Get_AccountAddressShipping

variables.description: This variable is used to store the Flow Element name if a flow errors.
variables.name: VarT_FlowElement
